name: remote-x11-ssh
description: Enables X11 forwarding with the Remote - SSH extension.

remoteX11.SSH.authenticationMethod.description: Sets how Remote X11 authenticates for SSH connections.
markdownEnumDescriptions: Public key authentication using the configured `#remoteX11.SSH.privateKey#` as the key file. Passphrase-protected keys are not supported.
Authenticate using a key saved to an SSH Agent. Use the `#remoteX11.SSH.agent#` setting if you are not using your platform's default agent.

remoteX11.SSH.agent.markdownDescription: Name of a Unix socket or Windows named pipe for ssh-agent. Set to `pageant` to use Pageant on Windows. If left empty, defaults to Windows 10's OpenSSH agent or the `SSH_AUTH_SOCK` environment variable on other platforms.

remoteX11.SSH.privateKey.description: The absolute file path to the SSH private key file.

remoteX11.SSH.displayCommand.markdownDescription: A command which prints `DISPLAY=<DISPLAY>` followed by a newline, where `<DISPLAY>` is the value of the `DISPLAY` environment variable.

remoteX11.SSH.host.markdownDescription: Sets the hostname or IP address to connect to instead of reading from `SSH_CONNECTION`.

remoteX11.SSH.port.markdownDescription: Sets the port to connect to instead of reading from `SSH_CONNECTION`.

remoteX11.SSH.timeout.markdownDescription: Number of seconds to wait for the SSH shell to print the `DISPLAY` variable. Use 0 to wait forever.

remoteX11.SSH.verboseLogging.description: Enable verbose logging for SSH connections.
